title: cafter
author: cafter
content: I am finding a jr. member signature campaign but not found one ,please tell me if there is one.i will follow all rules and terms and conditions.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Check this thread[1], so far, none of them accepts jr. ranks. Some accepts member but mostly its full member and above.Try to get active and make quality posts, and just follow the process.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=615953.0

comments.author: T3PR00T
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 19, 2023, 01:06:21 PMI am finding a jr. member signature campaign but not found one ,please tell me if there is one.i will follow all rules and terms and conditions.Jr. Member can have a signature but it's only few plain text which is in fact invincible. For someone paying money for it is like wasting money.
